titles.title: Greenbrier Basin Flood Control Act of 1997
To further enhance flood control efforts along the Greenbrier River Basin in the State of West Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Greenbrier Basin Flood Control Act of 1997 - Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1996 to increase from $12 to $40 million the authorization of appropriations for a flood damage reduction program for the Greenbrier River Basin, West Virginia.
